# robin_map
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/robin-map/master/include/tsl/robin_growth_policy.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/robin_growth_policy.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/robin-map/master/include/tsl/robin_hash.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/robin_hash.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/robin-map/master/include/tsl/robin_map.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/robin_map.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/robin-map/master/include/tsl/robin_set.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/robin_set.h)

# sparse_map
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/sparse-map/master/include/tsl/sparse_growth_policy.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparse_growth_policy.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/sparse-map/master/include/tsl/sparse_hash.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparse_hash.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/sparse-map/master/include/tsl/sparse_map.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparse_map.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/sparse-map/master/include/tsl/sparse_set.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparse_set.h)

# hopscotch_map
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/hopscotch-map/master/include/tsl/bhopscotch_map.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bhopscotch_map.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/hopscotch-map/master/include/tsl/bhopscotch_set.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bhopscotch_set.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/hopscotch-map/master/include/tsl/hopscotch_growth_policy.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/hopscotch_growth_policy.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/hopscotch-map/master/include/tsl/hopscotch_hash.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/hopscotch_hash.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/hopscotch-map/master/include/tsl/hopscotch_map.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/hopscotch_map.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tessil/hopscotch-map/master/include/tsl/hopscotch_set.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/hopscotch_set.h)
